frameset.edef: to go or walk barefoot, to have sore footentity walking

example.parse: (CONJ فَ) (NP-TPC-3 (NP (DET+NOUN الشابّ) (DET+ADJ المُفْلِس)) (SBAR (WHNP-1 (REL_PRON الَّذِي)) (S (VP (PV+PVSUFF_SUBJ:3FS حفيِت) (NP-SBJ (NOUN أَقْدام) (NP (NP (POSS_PRON_3MS هُ)) (NP (-NONE- *T*-1)))) (SBAR-ADV (SUB_CONJ وِ) (S (NP-TPC-2 (PRON_3MS هُوَّ)) (VP (IV3MS+IV يِبحث) (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *T*-2)) (PP-CLR (PREP عَن) (NP (NP (NOUN+NSUFF_FEM_SG وَظِيفَة)) (PP (PREP بِ) (NP (NP (X (NOUN مؤه) (PREP لِ) (NP (PRON_3MS ُه)))) (ADJP (DET+ADJ الجامِعِي)))))))))))))
